subject: Re: INFO for ALL a show about ITC and live events!! NOT Spam!
author: ourobouros2k2
full_text:
I have most of their shows archived on my ipod. They really put
together an informative show, with regular live rtsc/itc sessions with
one of their 3 devices. Their devices, derivatives of Mike's
spiricomp, are pretty cool, and their sessions are very cool to listen
to. Gotta say I am a fan of this show, and if you haven't heard them
yet, I think you will like them. Of course I love the fact that they
are focused on itc/rtsc.

thanks
Andy


--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "ghuny1" <itcnap@...> wrote:
>
> Hi All,
> Found this fascinating for all the ITC-RSTC  researchers out there!
> 
> On http:// Para-x.com <http://para-x.com>   radio!!! A station filled
> with a lot of guests and different shows including mine with
> International Paranormal!!
> 
> SHOW: Voices Carry Paranormal Talk Radio
> 
> TIME: Sundays at 6 PM Eastern
> 
> THEME: ITC (Instrumental Trans Communication), EVP , Frank's Box,
> Ghost Box, ITC device, Ghost Hunters, Ghosts, Haunted, Haunting,
> Investigations, Paranormal, Spiritual, Research.
> 
> HOST(s): Bob Meyers and Mark Sarro
> 
> WEB: http://www.voicescarryradio.com
> 
> EMAIL: voicescarryradio@...
> 
> OTHER INFO:
> Our investigative group site www.chestercountyprs.com The Voices Carry
> Paranormal Talk Radio show in association with CCPRS (Chester County
> Paranormal Research Society) located in West Chester, PA, prides itself
> in conducting scientific research with the latest and most up- to- date
> ITC (Instrumental Trans Communication) devices in the paranormal field.
> Our ITC devices that we possess are handmade and exclusively developed
> for spirit communication as we attempt to communicate with beings from
> the other side. Our shows each week include interviews with big name
> guests in the field, research findings, conversations or call-ins with
> our listeners and best of all real "Live" interactive ITC
> sessions on air where our listeners can interact and be a part of the
> actual sessions! Yes folks.this is real time EVP where you get to
> hear responses immediately from our feedback picked up by our ITC
> prototypes. There is no other paranormal show around like it.be
> sure to listen in and be a part of The Voices Carry Paranormal Radio
> Talk show REVOLUTION!
>
